DOC.brief_summary: Mesenchymal stem cells with multidirectional differentiation potential,autologous stem cell transplantation into ischemic foot, make its differentiation to form new blood capillary, improve and restore the local blood flow.
DOC.brief_title: Stem Cell Therapy for Patients With Vascular Occlusive Diseases Such as Diabetic Foot
